Articles.Content: I don't think this has come up yet, but has anyone found any new/fixed/broken anomalies in 1.0?

I would much enjoy new anomalies but as far as I know the Asteroids around Dres were the only new thing in 1.0.

Maybe someone can proof me wrong ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
